name: Mia Hamm Soccer 64
overview: Feel the excitement as you take the winning shot with soccer champion Mia Hamm! Be a part of Mia Hamm's All-Star team or take Mia on, as you play for the World Cup in front of thousands of animated fans. Learn the art of a corner kick, a penalty kick or how to beat a goalkeeper one-on-one, and get tips from Mia that you can take with you onto the real field!
